text: Anis nan ilaale; kunoo, fardi daalachi tokko fuula koo dura ture! Inni fardicha yaabbatus maqaan isaa Du始a jedhama ture; Sii始oolis dugda duubaan itti dhi始aatee isa duukaa bu始aa ture. Isaanis goraadeen, beelaan, balaa fi bineensota lafaatiin akka ajjeesaniif kurmaana lafaa irratti humni ni kennameef.
